vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.payout (patch_10.sol#102-107) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(ethToTransfer) (patch_10.sol#105)

vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.loseWager (patch_10.sol#115-119) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- require(bool,string)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))),Donation failed) (patch_10.sol#116)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: uint256 private randomSeed;
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.randomSeed (patch_10.sol#34) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- play (patch_10.sol#79-96)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (patch_10.sol#79-96) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_10.sol#109-113):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))),Donation failed) (patch_10.sol#110)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_10.sol#111)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (patch_10.sol#115-119):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))),Donation failed) (patch_10.sol#116)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_10.sol#117)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.play (patch_10.sol#79-96):
	External calls:
	- loseWager(betLimit / 2) (patch_10.sol#90)
	External calls sending eth:
	- payout(msg.sender) (patch_10.sol#88)
	- loseWager(betLimit / 2) (patch_10.sol#90)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- wagers (patch_10.sol#92)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: uint256 private randomSeed;

vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function openToThePublic() public onlyOwner {
        openToPublic = true;

        return wagers[player] > 0;

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity ^0.4.21;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_10.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (patch_10.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_10.sol#109-113):
	-require(bool,string)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))),Donation failed) patch_10.sol#110

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in PoCGame.loseWager (patch_10.sol#115-119):
	-require(bool,string)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))),Donation failed) patch_10.sol#116
